pages.text: O-Horses can carry your saddlebags, as they’re quite a bit bigger than vanilla horses. They also have the potential to run faster, depending on if you find yourself a swift one. O-Horses, when saddled, stay where you left them (ground tie) and don’t wander off, unlike their vanilla counterparts. $(br2)Overhauled horses come in over 1700+ different variant-marking combinations and multiple different breeds.

The Mustang spawns naturally in the world and can be bred for a 1-in-5 chance of getting a random breed. $(br2)You can place armor or carpets on your horses, mules and donkeys. You can also customize your O-Horse's mane and/or tail with Mane Scissors and Tail Scissors respectively. $(br2)To remove chests, simply shear them off with Shears.

O-Horses can be bred to have a chance of having a foal of a different breed. These breeds include: $(br2)Mustang, Ardennes, Kladruber, Fjord, Thoroughbred, Friesian, Irish Cob, American Quarter, Percheron, Selle Francais, Marwari, Mongolian, Shire, and Akhal-Teke.
